original_text: The chariot with the black horses goes toward the north country, the white ones go after them, and the dappled ones go toward the south country.”
korean_text: 검은 말은 북쪽 땅으로 나가고 흰 말은 그 뒤를 따르고 어룽진 말은 남쪽 땅으로 나가고

sentences.original_text: The chariot with the black horses goes toward the north country
sentences.korean_translation: 검은 말들이 끄는 병거는 북쪽 나라로 향합니다

sentences.original_text: the white ones go after them
and the dappled ones go toward the south country
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 점박이 말들은 남쪽 나라로 향합니다
